show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds
other_title: Doraemon e o Mistério das Nuvens (Portuguese)
Doraemon y el misterio de las nubes (Spanish)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita to Kumo no Ōkoku (Japanese)
哆啦A夢：大雄與雲之王國 (Chinese (Taiwan))
哆啦A梦：大雄的云之王国 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太と雲の王国 (Japanese)
電影多啦A夢：雲之國 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: During class, Nobita questions the teacher where heaven is located when he was being taught about clouds. Being laughed at, Nobita looks for proof that a heavenly place exists on the clouds, but was explained by Doraemon that it cannot exist scientifically. Disappointed, he was eventually helped by Doraemon to create their own kingdom of clouds. Little did they know that there are creatures who have been living on clouds for a long time.
